main event: Two triangular-shaped objects were observed in the sky near Wof Seguin, Texas on February 15, 1961.
interesting points: The objects were similar in appearance to balloons but were large and bright., The sighting lasted for approximately 1 minute., The objects moved slowly and then disappeared from view., The observer reported that balloons would appear small and dim, unlike the objects seen., The report highlights that the investigation ultimately revealed the observations coincided with a weather balloon release.
sighted object: two large triangular-shaped objects in the sky
